text1.title: Web, JavaScript & Typescript
text1.text: Mastering the fundamentals of HTML, CSS, JavaScript and TypeScript. I may not be the best in web design, but I assure proper coding design skills. Most of my projects use Typescript as it is easier to maintain.

text2.title: React.js & React Native
text2.text: I Have been practicing with these frameworks for more than 12 months. My skill sharpened over the year, and I learned new techniques to use this framework effectively. I use context API instead of Redux.

text3.title: Express.js and MongoDB
text3.text: I gained skill with these frameworks thru practice. However, most of my projects do not use these technologies. But still, I can assure to build quality code for the backend of the project.

text4.title: Java (OOP)
text4.text: My first programming language is assembly 6502, then C/C++, and then Java. I have learned to program about eight years ago so, my skill in the logic of programming is well developed.

projects.name: Gala: Virtual Tour Guide
projects.description: Gala VTG is a full-featured mobile application for tourists of Santa Rosa City. It has GPS navigation, an online forum, and additional features that a tourist will need! The app was created using React Native (Expo) and optimize for mobile screens.

projects.name: My porfolio website
projects.description: My portfolio website is single page application that is created with React.js and optimize for mobile and tablets. It is designed to have reusable components, which makes it easier to maintain. To change the information provided, it is easy as changing the values in json.

projects.name: Personal Reviewer
projects.description: Personal Reviewer is a mobile application developed with React Native Expo. It is made for my study as a student of Information Technology course. Currently, it is optimized to work on android phones with a smaller screen;
